metadata.name: BROKEN ARTIST'S HAND
metadata.description:
If life is a comedy sketch, I’m part of it.
I was doing Pepes to raise some funds for Kid’s school fee,
but one bizarre freak accident broke my finger.

This comedy sketch includes numeric puns
cause the date of the accident was Dec 23rd, 2021
12+23+20+21=76. 7+6= 13
The estimation of the surgery will cost about 1.3 Eth
Lucky number 13!! yay
Days spent in the hospital bed will be until Dec 25th. It looks like I will spend Xmas in hospital with a surgeon named “faith.”
That’s right, The surgeon has a name with a direct translation of FAITH! Doctor FAITH. 
I wish it would be Doctor Strange. I guess I gotta have faith for Christmas eve.

MIXED MEDIA
Broken pinky on LED
Displacement Fragment Fracture
Caput Metacarpal digiti V
